Skip to content Kid’s Meals Price and availability may vary by location. 5 Ct Nuggets Kid’s Meal 160 Cal per Entree Order now 2 Ct Chick-n-Strips Kid’s Meal ® 200 Cal per Entree Order now 5 Ct Grilled Nuggets Kid’s Meal 80 Cal per Entree Order now What's next Explore treats View treats Ages 4 and up ™ Legends of Evergreen Hills Celebrate the magic of the holiday season with four different interactive card games inspired by the Evergreen Hills universe. Test your memory with a fun matching game, enjoy a twist on Old Maid, trade and collect your favorite apprentices and characters, and dive into an immersive adventure where you help restore the sparks of Evergreen. These games are perfect for fun with friends and family! Collect all four titles: , ,, and Memory Quest My Apprentice Save the Spark Spark Tree. Available from participating restaurant locations, while supplies last. Ages 3 and under You’re My Little Celebrate the special bond between parent and child with these sweet and colorful rhyming board books. Part of a best-selling series, they feature adorable pictures and simple ideas that help little ones learn about love and sharing joy together. Perfect for early childhood fun! Collect all four titles: You’re My Little Bookworm, You’re My Little Honey Bunny, You’re My Little Snuggle Bear, and You’re My Little Sunshine. Available from participating restaurant locations, while supplies last. Discover the Chick-fil-A Play™ App The Chick-fil-A Play App is your home for free, family-friendly shows, games and activities designed to create more time with your favorite people. Make meaningful moments together while you watch, play, create, listen, and read. Learn more about Chick-fil-A Play Find a restaurant Enter your address, city and state, or zip, or use your current location.
